Designate Group 1 - KEY -
Select Group 1 - KEY -
Grouping Ships Overview:
Ships can be grouped - for easier selection.
You can have up to 10 groups.
Grouping is different than formations.
How To Group Ships:
Select one or more ships.
Designate it as a group (see above for group 1 key designation).
To select the group press the group key (see above for the group 1 selection).
To quickly focus the camera on the group - double tap the selection key.
Group marine frigates, keep them back during the initial assault, then once clear - select them and send them in.
Use groups for easier management of multi sided attacks.
In the image - groups - 1, 3, 5, and 9 are designated.
Group Status:
The main Tactical screen - has group status indicators. The numbers light up when at least one ship is part of that group.
History/Behind the scenes:

Grouping ships was added to Void Destroyer (a very long time) before formations. Nearly every RTS has unit grouping, but not every RTS has formations (that concept doesn't always apply to certain genres) - or grouping is just used.

Grouping and formations are fairly close to concept. Personally when I added formations to the game - I nearly stopped using groups. The two exist in Void Destroyer - so feel free to use one, the other, or both.
